body_html: OK, I understood, you just want to extent the file system interface for your own custom kernel. Because your solution works only on Linux, why you need the portable interface? Just implement everything in the kernel. It's more transparent and doesn't introduce not needed dependencies.

body: OK, I understood, you just want to extent the file system interface for your own custom kernel. Because your solution works only on Linux, why you need the portable interface? Just implement everything in the kernel. It's more transparent and doesn't introduce not needed dependencies.
